nodes.text: Rexellian Marshall was a male Rebel soldier who served under the command of General Crix Madine during the Galactic Civil War.

Rexellian Marshall and Kan 'Fixer' Deans were player characters generated in the early 1990's in Glasgow, Scotland, for a Star Wars Roleplaying Game campaign run by one of the writers on the Official Star Wars Fact File. When it came time to write about Blissex, the writer in question used Rex and Kan to fill in the gaps in the story.
